# Mobile Legends 9th Anniversary Event Website

This project is a Node.js web application for a Mobile Legends event that collects user information and sends it to Telegram.

## Project Structure
- Express.js server backend
- Premium HTML/CSS/JavaScript frontend
- Two-step form process (user/game ID â†’ email/password)
- Telegram bot integration

## Key Features
- Mobile Legends branding with official logo
- Premium UI design
- Form validation
- Telegram data forwarding

## Development Guidelines
- Use modern ES6+ JavaScript
- Implement responsive design
- Ensure secure data handling
- Test Telegram integration thoroughly
